title: "JACK AND SAM'S DESTINY"
author: "TuruaSam"
summary:
"

Jack O'Neill and Samantha Carter are ALWAYS destined to be together.
An AU setting
rating:
with Kawalsky as leader of SG1 instead of Jack. (Sam has NO romantic feelings for Kawalsky).
This AU basically followed the missions of the real SG1 up until this point (just before S7 E21 - The Lost City).
Jack owns a trail riding business and also breeds and trains Quarter horses on a small ranch that he bought after Sara and Charlie died and he retired from the Air Force.
A year ago
warnings: Kawalsky stepped back from leading SG1 due to injury
category: and Sam got promoted to Lieutenant Colonel to lead SG1(Teal'c
relationship:
and then promoted to Colonel as she continues to lead SG1.
General Kawalsky commands the SGC
characters:
and General Hammond is the head of Homeworld security. Janet never died and the President is Henry Hayes.
Jack saves Sam's life and they quickly fall in love
additional_tags:
but suddenly Sam's life is in serious danger again when her immune system mysteriously fails while they are snowed in. Sam deteriorates quickly and she's forced to tell Jack her secrets so he can get the Prometheus to beam them up and get her to the SGC so Janet can try to save her life.
COMPLETE SUMMARY IS IN CHAPTER 1

title: "Shattered Pieces"

summary:
"

This is not a feel-good story in the beginning. This is about shattering trust and trying to rebuild a life afterwards. There's tons of triggers in here. Heed the ratings and warnings. There is rape in here
rating: more than one description of it. But even after
warnings: there's signs of second chances and healing. It's a long road
fandoms:
and was incredibly hard to write.

This has turned into a story about hope and overcoming. Chapters get more hopeful as more are written. But this is dark and won't be everyone's cup of tea or coffee. Thank you for everyone who has taken time to read and comment. It's nice to know I'm handling this as well as could be expected.

title: "Parabellum"
author: "sifshadowheart"
summary:
"

The first visitors the Earth ever knew were the Alterans
rating: an advanced alien race who seeded two galaxies with life in their own image - even as they fled from their mistakes
warnings:
leaving their abandoned children and aborted experiments to struggle without them.

First among their descendants were the Tau'ri - humans of Earth who had spawned a secondary evolution when their creators weren't watching: Sentinels and Guides
category: stretching back as far as humanity could remember or their artifacts recalled
fandoms:
their protectors and defenders facing every threat from without *or* within.

All that came after: Ori
chapters_posted: the Trust; all came to find that the first obstacle was never the last
chapters_total: not so long as the Sentinels
kudos:
and their Council still lived.

So it made sense that the greatest defender Earth had when they realized that humanity wasn't alone in their universe was a Sentinel.

Just as it was fitting that the greatest protector all of humanity had would be a Guide
bookmarks:
whose fierce loyalty was almost as legendary as his ruthlessness.

And then there was Atlantis: the Lost City
hits:
abandoned and waiting for her people to return.

"

so she can change the past and save Jack.

relationship: and now she can die in peace

knowing that Jack is safe and the younger version of herself and her babies will survive.

additional_tags: and suddenly Sam is faced with the heartbreaking reality that the Jack she had saved

was no longer hers.

words:
their secret emotions almost destroy them.
Original Sam can't stop feeling guilty and knows that after her babies are born
chapters_posted:
she will have to give up Jack even though it will break her heart.

title: "Home"
author: "XWingKC"
summary:
"

This is my very first work in fanfiction. I'm excited
rating: but nervous! I don't own these characters. This is my interpretation of them."Home" is a Stargate SG-1/Atlantis fanfiction original short story. It takes place the year after Colonel Samantha Carter takes command of Atlantis. It does provide an alternate path for her from the canon line. title: "87 Minutes: A Longshot"
author: "Kinggorilla"
summary:
"

With Colonel O'Neill being held captive by Ba'al
rating: there is no way SG-1 would stand around with their respective hands in their respective pockets.  Straws would be grasped
warnings: wild guesses made.  Notions would be had
category:
and ideas would be tried. Their success would largely be in the eye of the beholder.

The events described here begin at the 17:10 mark of the SG-1 episode "Abyss" (s06e06). They occur in real time and take up about 87 minutes
fandoms:
hence the title.

The question will be raised: "Is this an AU?"
I can't answer that. I can only say it wasn't written that way
relationship:
but the decision will ultimately lie with the reader. I can see how a case could be made either way.

There is a fair bit of violence
additional_tags:
which I suppose would classify this as "TV violence". If you don't like shoot-'em-ups this may not be for you.

The original character of Col. Robert Campbell was originally introduced in "Squirrels From Hell".

Salty language abounds
published:
none of it is in poor taste.
You were warned.

warnings: but facts quickly pile up that cast doubt on the obvious conclusion.  Two Jack O'Neills were on base at the same time. Daniel's injuries are too many and too varied in age to have been dealt during the brief time Jack and he were both in that closet
category:
and this Daniel is missing an organ that Fraiser knows their Daniel still has.

Before long
fandoms: it's clear that more than just two realities are involved in this catastrophe

title: "Dubitatio"
author: "eideann"
summary:
"

P3R-118 seems to be an idyllic place. Science and technology hold back the catastrophe of an ice age that threatens all the planet's inhabitants with extinction
warnings:
humankind lives in peace and harmony. SG-1 is tasked with treating with the planet's leadership with the goal of eventual technological exchange.

During the carefully managed guided tours their hosts take them on
category: Jack and Daniel stumble on a secret that raises all kinds of questions about the story and histories they've been fed.  Angry at being misled
fandoms: Jack takes a bold approach to the planet's leadership
characters: he didn't take the time to report in to Stargate Command
additional_tags: so when the leader takes Jack's criticism amiss
language:
SG-1 is on their own far from home and at the mercy of their hosts. Soon they find out that the society is even more questionable than they had guessed.

Shortly thereafter
published: all most of them remember is the urgent need to keep the power plant operating in their underground home to stave off the encroaching ice.  Only Daniel knows who he is
chapters_posted:
and that they need to find their way home.

"

summary:

The OTPodcast is a meta round table podcast where fans discuss all things fanfiction.

In this episode
rating: we actually have two entirely separate conversations that ended up being about the same things - the way that fans interact with canon and the question of how to define canon. When is a creator's headcanon just a headcanon? What did Joss Whedon do that turned his very name into a synonym for a painful canon-explosion? And in the end
warnings: why do fans adore some aspects of canon

"

A Science-Fiction Romance.

In the year 799 (Aschen calender)
rating: Earth is a colony under strict reign by an oppressive Aschen government. They have  seized control over the entire planet
warnings: including the Stargate. Humanity is at the brink of extinction. Human lifespan has almost tripled
category: but most of the human population is born infertile. Only a small percent of humans are so-called gifted ones
fandoms: who are able to conceive/father children. Strict rules apply to these gifted ones
relationship:
as the Aschen want to uphold the human population.

Sam Carter is 25 years old. She has just come of age and undergoes her first fertility tests. When her tests turn out positive
characters: her life is about to take a dramatic turn for the worse. Unwilling to accept a forced marriage and life in a breeding facility under Aschen control
additional_tags:
she runs away from home to find the resistance and fight for the freedom of Earth as well as her own.
As she meets Jack O'Neill
published: neither of them realizes they are bound together by more than the mutual goal to free Earth from Aschen reign. Side by side
words: they fight to liberate their world using a second

secret Stargate found almost a century before in the Antarctica forests...

title: "phoenix"
author: "openended"
summary:
"

No one expected the end of the world to come from the Earth itself. It was supposed to be aliens and explosions coming from above
rating: not a maelstrom of earthquakes and volcanoes and floods turning most of the planet into uninhabitable wasteland. When three-fourths of SG-1 crawl out of the rubble that used to be Cheyenne Mountain
warnings: they reluctantly have to leave Jack behind
category: presumed dead. Threats of alien invasion and hostile takeover are replaced by finding food and shelter; daily briefings and offworld missions are traded for security concerns and rebuilding. Through it all
characters: and Teal‚Äôc find that there‚Äôs more to survival than supplies and a place to wait out the storm.

title:
ghosts of the past aren‚Äôt really dead at all.

"

title: "Jigsaw (podfic)"
author: "susan_voight"
summary:
"

Download or stream a podfic of Jigsaw by Dira Sudis.

Author's summary: Jack wakes up in the SGC to the news that his team is dead. If he weren't hearing the news from General Hammond he might not believe it--and even so it's not quite real until he sees the bodies. Once he does
rating:
he knows nothing is ever going to be the same again.

Sam wakes up in the SGC to the news that she is now the senior member of SG-1. Jack O'Neill is dead. For Sam and her team
warnings:
nothing is ever going to be the same again.

SG-1 might be able to go on like this--Sam's going to keep her team together if it kills her--but a man who's lost his team is capable of anything
category:
and Jack's about to do the unthinkable to make things right.

"

author: "fems"
summary:
"

Colonel Jack O‚ÄôNeill grudgingly accepted his new orders; he would just have to view Colonel Samantha Carter as yet another assignment. To Sam it was anything but an assignment; he epitomized everything she had lost and she was hell-bent on righting this wrong.

id:
The fic was nominated in the Best Sam Centric category of the Sam & Jack Multimedia Awards 2015 and won in the Best Alternate Timeline category of the Sam & Jack Multimedia Awards 2014:

id: This novel is a sequel to 'The Price to Pay' and it will only make sense if you read the other novel first.
Everyone has an agenda. The rebel Jaffa want freedom. The Asgard are playing a double game. Lord Yu has his own inscrutable plans. President Kinsey has ambitions too.

title: how are O'Neill and Sunlight going to find each other again?  Can Sam
author: Daniel and Teal'c help?

id: Can Cassandra stay sane after losing everyone she loves?

Can Kantele help his friends when he has problems of his own?

id: Jack O'Neill and Harry Maybourne have very different approaches to ethics. Jack believes in honour and honesty. Harry believes the ends justify the means.
When Jack's daughter from a parallel reality comes through the stargate
title: both Jack and Harry find that their past (canonical) decisions have unforeseen consequences. What price are they willing to pay to put things right again? Can they work together? How far can Maybourne be trusted?

id: Jack and Sam have many difficult decisions to face. Can they maintain the careful balance of their working relationship while juggling with their feelings for one another?

title: "What Will the Future Hold
author: Part II"
summary: "fems"
rating:
"

Two years have passed and Colonel Samantha Carter has stepped down from commanding SG-1 and is devoting her genius solely to understanding and reverse-engineering alien technology in her lab at the SGC. At home
warnings: she is fulfilling the role of wife and stepmother as best as she can but doubt is creeping in: perhaps she has finally found something she is not good at?

id: With Daniel's return from his assignment at Atlantis Cassie is planning a welcome home party at the SGC for all his friends and coworkers on Earth. Coming face-to-face with her former commanding officer there
title: Sam realizes her marriage has not resolved her inappropriate feelings for him.

id: She also becomes aware of the fact she compromised who she is in order to obtain that elusive normal life and has distanced herself from her loved ones all this time. Understanding the consequences of her choices and how her actions have hurt them
title: Sam decides drastic measures are needed. Starting with rebuilding her friendship with Major General Jack O'Neill.
it looks like she might be too late; have the roles been reversed and is Jack the one with the normal life and a happily ever after
author:
while she was the one craving it?
